item.title: Photochemical Film
item.description: Digital Intermediate vs Photochemically finished film https://cinematography.com/index.php?/forums/topic/101752-digital-intermediate-vs-photochemically-finished-film/

item.title: Film Skintone Saturation / Density
item.description: https://www.liftgammagain.com/forum/index.php?threads/film-skintone-saturation.18267/ Chris Wright Oct 4, 2023 #4 saturation is a perceived visual construct. this is why we have so many color models. HSL, HSV, HCL, etc. The tricky part is transforming from an additive color model to a subtractive one while at the same time, reversing our shot so that we perceive filmed subtractive properties in the first place. You can visually collapse the color model yourself with perceptual grading by reverse modeling.

item.title: Film Emulation
item.description: 数据 Data Film Database: https://github.com/juneleung/FilmDatabase/ @Juneleung filmtypes: https://www.filmtypes.com/ 胶片模拟 Emulation SIGGRAPH 2010 - Color Enhancement and Rendering in Film and Game Production - Film Simulation for Video Games - Yoshiharu Gotanda https://renderwonk.com/publications/s2010-color-course/gotanda/slide_film_simulation_for_videogames.pdf https://renderwonk.com/publications/s2010-color-course/gotanda/course_note_film_simulation_for_videogames.pdf Realistic Film Grain Rendering https://www.lirmm.fr/~nfaraj/publications/film_grain_ipol/2017_Newson_film_grain.pdf AI FilterSimulation https://github.com/fg0521/filter4free @柴师傅在打工 论坛 Forum What is the best example of film emulation?: https://www.liftgammagain.com/forum/index.php?threads/what-is-the-best-example-of-film-emulation.15452/ CN：讨论｜最好的模拟胶片效果的数字电影是？: https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/4XlwYWN0hbasXtPZg8eGOw LUT Simulation: https://discuss.pixls.us/t/film-emulation-simulation/22935/8
